      • searchForSimilarDocuments

        SortedDocumentsSet searchForSimilarDocuments(DocumentsCollection col,
                                             Document doc,
                                             int k,
                                             boolean isSuperMode)
        Given a number k greater than 0 and a document, finds the k most similar documents in the collection.
        Parameters:
        col - List of all documents
        doc - Document which will be used as a reference.
        k - number of documents that will be found if possible
        Returns:
        A set of document sorted.
